entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
